title: Sound On: Rep. Barr, Border Crisis, Sen. Smith, Energy
itunes:title: Sound On: Rep. Barr, Border Crisis, Sen. Smith, Energy
description:
Guests: Rep. Andy Barr, a Republican representing Kentucky's 6th district, Democratic Senator Tina Smith of Minnesota and Brandon Neal, former deputy chief of staff and political advisor to Rep Karen Bass, and former senior advisor to Pete Buttigieg’s presidential campaign.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
